name: 蕭立帆
objective:
分享 25 年以上的技術經驗在半導體，電子材料，軟磁材料和特殊鋼產業。主要的應用是電動車，智慧手機，5G 通訊，電子，汽車，航太，太陽能及風電。能幫助學生了解台灣產業優勢，進而激發學生對材料研究與產品開發的創新思維，強化對學術或產業職涯的規劃。
To share 25+ years of technical experience in various industries like semiconductors, electronic materials, soft magnetic materials, and specialty steels for applications on EV, smartphones, 5G communication, electronics, automobiles, aerospace, solar, and wind. It will help students understand the industrial strengths of Taiwan, inspire their materials innovation in research and product development, and pursue their careers for the future.
schedule:
Self Introduction
Major Industries related to Materials in Taiwan
Introduction of Materials
Alloy Elements and its Effect
SiC and GaN Power Devices
EV and its Market
Soft Magnetic Materials and Its Applications
Brazing Materials and Its Applications
Clad Metals for Heat Sink and Bimetal Alloy
Specialty Steels
Nickel Base Superalloys and Its Applications
Tool Steels
Fastener
Low CTE (Coefficient of Thermal Expansion) Invar 36
Copper Strip and Its Applications
Environmental Social Governance
scorePolicy:
40% for Class Performance
30% for Midterm
30% for Final
